title: 90-Day Progress Check-In
description: Share your employment progress and experience 90 days after completing the AI training program.

questions.question: Are you currently employed in an AI-related role?
options: Yes, started within the last 90 days
Yes, but I was already employed before the program
No, I took a break from job searching

questions.question: If you selected 'Other', please specify:
When did you start your current job?
What is your job title?
questions.placeholder: e.g., AI Data Analyst, Junior Developer...

questions.question: What company do you work for (or type of company if you'd rather not name it)?
questions.placeholder: Company name, or 'Tech startup', 'Fortune 500 company', etc.

questions.question: What industry is your company in?
If you selected 'Other' industry, please specify:
Is this role AI-related or does it involve AI skills?
options: AI skills are helpful but not primary

questions.question: Are you employed full-time or part-time?
What is your starting/current annual salary (or hourly rate)?
What was the biggest factor in getting hired for this role?
If you selected 'Other' hiring factor, please specify:
questions.placeholder: Describe what helped you get hired...

questions.question: Did you mention the AI Fundamentals program during your interviews?
options: Yes, but it didn't seem to matter

questions.question: Did you share your capstone projects with the employer?
options: Yes, but they didn't ask about them

questions.question: How many interviews have you had in the last 90 days?
What's your biggest barrier to finding employment right now?
options: Not enough relevant job openings in my area
Salary expectations don't match job market
Not sure what I'm looking for

questions.question: If you selected 'Other' barrier, please specify:
Are you still actively job searching?
options: Not actively right now, but will be soon
No, I've decided to pursue a different path

questions.question: How much support from the program would help your job search right now?
options: I'm doing okay on my own

questions.question: Which support would be most valuable?
If you selected 'Other' support type, please specify:
questions.placeholder: Describe what support would be valuable...

questions.question: Looking back, how well did the program prepare you for the job market?
What was most valuable about the program?
questions.placeholder: Share what aspects of the program were most helpful...

questions.question: What would have been more helpful?
questions.placeholder: Share suggestions for what could have better prepared you...

questions.question: Would you recommend this program to others looking to get into AI?
Why or why not would you recommend this program?
Are you interested in staying connected with the program?
options: Yes, I'd like to attend alumni events
Not really, but keep me on the email list
No, please remove me from communications

questions.question: Would you be willing to mentor future students or speak to upcoming cohorts about your experience?
